name: Arknights-Suzuran(铃兰/スズラン)
description:
This is a LoRA for Suzuran chan from Arknights.

Version1.0 only trained the head for flexible outfits and more tags are needed. AdamW optimizer.

LionV3 is trained as a multi-concept LoRA using Lion optimizer. It includes the new outfit Yukibare.

スズランちゃんは私たちの光。

modelVersions.name: LionV3
modelVersions.description:
Multi concepts model

Trigger words: default outfit, Lostlands Flowering, Spring Praise, Yukibare
